about.title: Discover places around the world
about.text:
Welcome to Blogex, a content creation space where you will find articles about interesting sites.

Sign up, create your personal blog with your own articles and customize them with the new intuitive and easy to use text editing tool.

Make people discover the sites you know through your posts, photos and youtube videos.

login.wrong-data: We do not recognize de user, email or password. Please, check that your details are correct or singup first if you do not have an account yet.
login.user-saved: User successfully registered. Please enter your login details.

signup.pass-length: The password must be at least 8 characters long and must contain both numbers and letters

email-send.valid: We have sent you an email to

reset-pass.pass-length: The password must be at least 8 characters long and must contain both numbers and letters
reset-pass.valid: Password successfully modified. Redirecting to home page...

article-card.valid-video: Please select a valid video file

footer.text: Technology plays a fundamental role in our lives, it is a milestone in constant evolution. We use it in every context of our daily lives, without much reflection; and it has gone from being a luxury to becoming a necessity.

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to continue? If you click OK you will delete all your posts, photos and videos.
delete.insert-username: Please enter your username to cancel your account:
delete.wrong-username: We are sorry but we do not recognize the username.
